description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Carrot & Sweet Potato Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Low fat
name: Spiced Carrot & Sweet Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs no added salt tomato paste
425g no added salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, chickpeas, garlic and spices and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until onion is soft.

Stir in tomato paste, carrot, sweet potato and stock. Increase heat to high and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium, partly cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. purée using a stick blender until quite smooth.
Combine pepitas and dukkah, scatter over soup and serve.
